Introduction
This topic contains guidance on reexaminations and reductions for prestabilization ratings, including
future examination control of prestabilization ratings
reevaluation of the service-connected (SC) disability(ies) in prestabilization ratings
, and
effective date of reductions in combined evaluations under 38 CFR 3.105(e)
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section A - Prestabilization Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.28
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section A
